response.overview: This happened at a bar. When Hia, the owner of the Coyote bar, sees the kids in the bar dancing. Both fun moves in fun rhythms, sexy teenage style, customer provoking style and lesbian show. which made Hia think about sweeping the whole store, especially Plein, who liked Hia so much without letting her wife know. But there was a good-looking young waiter cutting his face off. Hia became angry with jealousy, so assassinated and killed a waitress named Kham and wrestled with pleasure. Draft Kham possesses the form of a doll at the shrine. Joy goes to ask for a lottery ticket and brings the doll back to the shop. The ghost in the body of the doll then came back to reclaim it with a vengeance. until he dies and comes back to love and enjoy again thus causing love between people and ghosts
response.title: The Ghost Toy
